18 DeviceOutputInterface::DeviceOutputInterface(DeviceOutputInterface &&src) noexcept {
19 *this = std::move(src);
20 }
21
22
23 DeviceOutputInterface &DeviceOutputInterface::operator=(DeviceOutputInterface &&rhs) noexcept {
24 if (this != &rhs) {
25
26 _parent_device = rhs._parent_device;
27 _output_enabled = rhs._output_enabled;
28 _impl = std::move(rhs._impl);
29 _keyer_impl = std::move(rhs._keyer_impl);
30
31 // Make sure to disable the rhs
32 rhs._parent_device = nullptr;
33 rhs._output_enabled = false;
34 }
35
36 return *this;
37 }
38
39 DeviceOutputInterface::~DeviceOutputInterface() {
40 if (_impl) disable();
41 }
42
43
44 VideoOutputFrame DeviceOutputInterface::create_video_frame(
45 const DisplayMode &display_mode,
46 const PixelFormat &pixel_format
47 ) {
48
49 if (!_impl) load_impl();
50
51 IDeckLinkMutableVideoFrame *frame;
52 HRESULT result = _impl->CreateVideoFrame(
53 static_cast<int32_t>(display_mode.get_width()),
54 static_cast<int32_t>(display_mode.get_height()),
55 static_cast<int32_t>(display_mode.get_width() * PixelFormat_::get_depth(pixel_format)),
56 static_cast<BMDPixelFormat>(pixel_format),
57 static_cast<BMDVideoOutputFlags>(VideoOutputFlags::Default),
58 &frame
59 );
60
61 if (result != S_OK) {
62 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
63 << errmsg("Unable to create video frame")
64 << decklink_command("IDeckLinkOutput::CreateVideoFrame")
65 << decklink_error_code(static_cast<HResult>(result))
66 );
67 };
68
69 return VideoOutputFrame(frame);
70 }
71
72
73 DeviceOutputInterface &DeviceOutputInterface::display_video_frame(
74 const VideoOutputFrame& frame
75 ) {
76 if (!_impl) load_impl();
77
78 HRESULT result = _impl->DisplayVideoFrameSync(frame.get_raw_ptr());
79
80 if (result != S_OK) {
81 std::string errdesc;
82 switch (result) {
83 case E_INVALIDARG:
84 errdesc = "Unable to display frame: invalid video mode, pixel format or flags";
85 break;
86 case E_ACCESSDENIED:
87 errdesc = "Unable to access the hardware or input stream currently active";
88 break;
89 default:
90 errdesc = "Unknown error";
91 break;
92 }
93
94 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
95 << errmsg(errdesc)
96 << decklink_device(_parent_device->get_display_name())
97 << decklink_command("IDeckLinkVideoOutput::DisplayVideoFrameSync")
98 );
99 }
100
101 return *this;
102 }
103
104
105 DeviceOutputInterface &DeviceOutputInterface::enable(
106 DisplayMode display_mode,
107 PixelFormat pixel_format,
108 VideoOutputFlags flags
109 ) {
110 if (!_impl) load_impl();
111
112 BMDDisplayModeSupport is_supported;
113 HRESULT result = _impl->DoesSupportVideoMode(
114 static_cast<BMDDisplayMode>(display_mode.get_image_format()),
115 static_cast<BMDPixelFormat>(pixel_format),
116 static_cast<BMDVideoInputFlags>(flags),
117 &is_supported, /* resultDisplayMode = */
118 nullptr
119 );
120
121 if (result != S_OK) {
122 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
123 << errmsg("Unable to query device for display mode support")
124 << decklink_device(_parent_device->get_display_name())
125 << decklink_error_code(static_cast<HResult>(result))
126 );
127 }
128
129 if (!is_supported) {
130 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(runtime_error()
131 << errmsg(
132 "The desired output configuration is not supported on this device: "
133 + ImageFormat_::pretty_print(display_mode.get_image_format()) + " - "
134 + PixelFormat_::pretty_print(pixel_format)
135 )
136 << decklink_device(_parent_device->get_display_name())
137 );
138 }
139
140 result = _impl->EnableVideoOutput(
141 static_cast<BMDDisplayMode>(display_mode.get_image_format()),
142 static_cast<BMDVideoOutputFlags>(flags)
143 );
144 if (result != S_OK) {
145 std::string errdesc;
146 switch (result) {
147 case E_ACCESSDENIED:
148 errdesc = "Unable to access the hardware or output stream currently active";
149 break;
150 case E_OUTOFMEMORY:
151 errdesc = "Unable to create a new frame";
152 break;
153 default:
154 errdesc = "Unknown error";
155 break;
156 }
157
158 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
159 << errmsg(errdesc)
160 << decklink_device(_parent_device->get_display_name())
161 << decklink_command("IDeckLinkVideoOutput::EnableVideoOutput")
162 );
163 }
164
165 _output_enabled = true;
166 return *this;
167 }
168
169
170 DeviceOutputInterface &DeviceOutputInterface::disable() {
171 if (!_output_enabled) return *this;
172 if (!_impl) load_impl();
173
174 const auto result = _impl->DisableVideoOutput();
175
176 if (result != S_OK) {
177 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
178 << errmsg("Unable to disable video output")
179 << decklink_command("IDeckLinkOutput::DisableVideoOutput")
180 << decklink_error_code(static_cast<HResult>(result))
181 );
182 }
183
184 _output_enabled = false;
185 return *this;
186 }
187
188
189 std::vector<DisplayMode> DeviceOutputInterface::get_all_supported_display_modes() {
190 if (!_impl) load_impl();
191
192 std::vector<DisplayMode> display_modes;
193
194 IDeckLinkDisplayMode *mode = nullptr;
195 IDeckLinkDisplayModeIterator *it = nullptr;
196
197 if (const HRESULT result = _impl->GetDisplayModeIterator(&it) != S_OK) {
198 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
199 << errmsg("Unknown error")
200 << decklink_command("IDeckLinkOutput::Disable VideoOutput")
201 << decklink_error_code(static_cast<HResult>(result))
202 );
203 }
204
205 assert(it);
206 while (it->Next(&mode) == S_OK) {
207 display_modes.emplace_back(mode);
208 }
209
210 return display_modes;
211 }
212
213
214 boost::optional<DisplayMode> DeviceOutputInterface::get_display_mode(
215 ImageFormat image_format
216 ) {
217 const auto display_modes = get_all_supported_display_modes();
218
219 auto found = std::find_if(
220 display_modes.begin(), display_modes.end(),
221 [&image_format](DisplayMode item) {
222 return item.get_image_format() == image_format;
223 });
224
225 if (found != display_modes.end())
226 return *found;
227
228 return {};
229 }
230
231
232 bool DeviceOutputInterface::supports_pixel_format(
233 const DisplayMode &display_mode,
234 PixelFormat pixel_format
235 ) {
236 // Supported can be Supported or SupportedWithConversion
237 // Both are OK for us
238 const auto supported = get_display_mode_support(display_mode, pixel_format);
239
240 return (supported != DisplayModeSupport::NotSupported);
241 }
242
243
244 std::vector<PixelFormat> DeviceOutputInterface::get_supported_pixel_formats(
245 const DisplayMode &display_mode
246 ) {
247 std::vector<PixelFormat> formats;
248
249 for (const auto format: PixelFormat_::Values) {
250 if (format != PixelFormat::Unknown && supports_pixel_format(display_mode, format))
251 formats.push_back(format);
252 }
253
254 return formats;
255 }
256
257
258 DisplayModeSupport DeviceOutputInterface::get_display_mode_support(
259 const DisplayMode& display_mode,
260 const PixelFormat pixel_format,
261 const VideoOutputFlags output_flags
262 ) {
263 if (!_impl) load_impl();
264
265 BMDDisplayModeSupport is_supported;
266 const HRESULT result = _impl->DoesSupportVideoMode(
267 display_mode.get_raw_mode(),
268 static_cast<BMDPixelFormat>(pixel_format),
269 static_cast<BMDVideoOutputFlags>(output_flags),
270 &is_supported, /* resultDisplayMode = */
271 nullptr
272 );
273
274 if (result != S_OK) {
275 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
276 << errmsg(
277 "An unknown error occured whilst calling IDeckLinkOutput::DoesSupportVideoMode "
278 "on " + display_mode.get_name()
279 )
280 << decklink_device(_parent_device->get_display_name())
281 );
282 }
283
284 return static_cast<DisplayModeSupport>(is_supported);
285 }

291
292 DeviceOutputInterface::DeviceOutputInterface(Device *parent_device)
293 : _parent_device(parent_device) {
294 if (!parent_device) {
295 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(null_pointer_error()
296 << errmsg("Cannot create an output device from a null pointer")
297 );
298 }
299 }
300
301 //
302 // Protected Methods - Loaders
303 //
304
305
306 void DeviceOutputInterface::load_impl() {
307 load_interface(
308 _parent_device->_device_impl.get(), IID_IDeckLinkOutput, _impl, "output"
309 );
310 assert(_impl);
311 }
312
313 void DeviceOutputInterface::load_keyer_interface() {
314 load_interface(
315 _parent_device->_device_impl.get(), IID_IDeckLinkKeyer, _keyer_impl, "keyer"
316 );
317 assert(_keyer_impl);
318 }
319
320
321 DeviceOutputInterface& DeviceOutputInterface::enable_keyer(bool is_external) {
322 if (!_keyer_impl) load_keyer_interface();
323
324 const HRESULT result = _keyer_impl->Enable(is_external);
325 if (result != S_OK) {
326 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
327 << errmsg("Unable to enable keying on this device")
328 << decklink_command("IDeckLinkKeyer::Enable")
329 << decklink_device(_parent_device->get_long_name())
330 << decklink_error_code(static_cast<HResult>(result))
331 );
332 }
333
334 _keyer_enabled = true;
335 return *this;
336 };
337
338
339 DeviceOutputInterface& DeviceOutputInterface::set_opacity(const uint8_t level) {
340 if (!_keyer_impl) load_keyer_interface();
341
342 const HRESULT result = _keyer_impl->SetLevel(level);
343 if (result != S_OK) {
344 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
345 << errmsg("Unable to change the opacity on the keyer")
346 << decklink_command("IDeckLinkKeyer::SetLevel")
347 << decklink_device(_parent_device->get_long_name())
348 << decklink_error_code(static_cast<HResult>(result))
349 );
350 }
351
352 return *this;
353 }
354
355
356 DeviceOutputInterface& DeviceOutputInterface::set_opacity(const float level) {
357 if (level < 0.0f or level > 1.0f)
358 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(out_of_range_error()
359 << errmsg("Opacity should be in the inclusive range [ 0.0; 1.0 ]")
360 );
361
362 return set_opacity(static_cast<uint8_t>(level * 255));
363 }
364
365
366 DeviceOutputInterface& DeviceOutputInterface::ramp_up_opacity(uint32_t number_of_frames) {
367 if (!_keyer_impl) load_keyer_interface();
368
369 const HRESULT result = _keyer_impl->RampUp(number_of_frames);
370 if (result != S_OK) {
371 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
372 << errmsg("Unable to ramp up the opacity on the keyer")
373 << decklink_command("IDeckLinkKeyer::RampUp")
374 << decklink_device(_parent_device->get_long_name())
375 << decklink_error_code(static_cast<HResult>(result))
376 );
377 }
378 return *this;
379 }
380
381 DeviceOutputInterface& DeviceOutputInterface::ramp_down_opacity(uint32_t number_of_frames) {
382 if (!_keyer_impl) load_keyer_interface();
383
384 const HRESULT result = _keyer_impl->RampDown(number_of_frames);
385 if (result != S_OK) {
386 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
387 << errmsg("Unable to ramp down the opacity on the keyer")
388 << decklink_command("IDeckLinkKeyer::RampDown")
389 << decklink_device(_parent_device->get_long_name())
390 << decklink_error_code(static_cast<HResult>(result))
391 );
392 }
393
394 return *this;
395 }
396
397 DeviceOutputInterface& DeviceOutputInterface::disable_keyer() {
398 if (!_keyer_enabled) return *this;
399 if (!_keyer_impl) load_keyer_interface();
400
401 const auto result = _keyer_impl->Disable();
402
403 if (result != S_OK) {
404 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
405 << errmsg("Unable to disable keyer output")
406 << decklink_command("IDeckLinkKeyer::Disable")
407 << decklink_error_code(static_cast<HResult>(result))
408 );
409 }
410
411 _keyer_enabled = false;
412 return *this;
413 };
